item.Q:
Write the character: liáo

item.A:
聊 (strokes unavailable)
to chat; to have a chat; to kill time
无聊 (無聊) wúliáo nonsense; bored
bàinián pay a New Year call; wish sb a Happy New Year

traditional: 拜會
bàihuì pay an official call; call on; visit in an official capacity

traditional: 拜見
bàijiàn pay a formal visit; call to pay respects; meet one's senior or superior

traditional: 破爛
pòlàn ragged
xìnfēng envelope
fēnfēng to divide and confer (property on one's descendants)
bànfēngjiàn semi-feudal

fēngdi manor
fēngdì manor
fēngcún to sequester; to seal up; to freeze (an account)
fēngjiàn feudal

traditional: 封建主義
fēngjiànzhǔyì feudalism

traditional: 封建社會
fēngjiànshèhuì feudal society

traditional: 封條
fēngtiáo seal
fēngmiàn cover (front cover of a magazine)

traditional: 開封
Kāifēng Kaifeng city in Henan, old capital of Northern Song, former provincial capital of Henan; old name Bianliang 汴梁
kāifēng to open

traditional: 作惡
zuòè to do evil

traditional: 可惡
kěwù (adj) obnoxious; repulsive; abhorrent; hateful; abominable

traditional: 惡人
èrén evil person

traditional: 惡化
èhuà worsen

traditional: 惡心
èxīn bad habit; vicious habit; vice
ěxīn nausea; to feel sick; disgust; nauseating

traditional: 惡性
èxìng (adj) malignant; evil producing; wicked

traditional: 惡意
èyì malice

traditional: 惡感

traditional: 惡果
èguǒ bad result

traditional: 惡魔
èmó demon; fiend

traditional: 無惡不作
wúèbùzuò not to stop at any crime; to commit any imaginable misdeed
bùliáng bad; harmful; unhealthy

traditional: 優良
yōuliáng fine; good
shànliáng good and honest; kind-hearted
gǎiliáng improve

traditional: 改良主義

traditional: 的確良
díquèliáng dacron
jīngliáng good

traditional: 良種

traditional: 馬良

móyàng appearance

mótèer (fashion) model

traditional: 病狀

lànghuā spray
